title: 2 Bed 2 Bath + HUUGE WRAPAROUND PRIVATE TERRACE n Prospect Heights~ NO
posting_body: ['2 Bed 2 Bath + HUUGE WRAPAROUND PRIVATE TERRACE n Prospect Heights~', 'NO BROKERS FEE', 'Listing ID #: 138661', 'Price: $11,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Health Club', 'Pool', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Roof Deck', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Terrace', 'Outdoor Space', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'MAASSIVE WRAPAROUND PRIVATE TERRACE!', 'BEST VIEWS FOR SUNRISE AND SUNSETS IN ALL OF BROOKLYN', 'OR', 'YOUR MONEY BACK :) STATE OF ART 2-bed 2-bath offers a huge private terrace, a den that can be experienced as a third bedroom, beautiful views, an in-home washer/dryer, generous storage, walk-in closets, and sleek finishes!', 'This luxury building offers a 24-hour doorman, expansive fitness center, movie screening room, a 360-degree Sky Lounge with an outdoor pool, conference rooms, and huge lounge areas.', "Situated in prime Prospect Heights, you're near historic landmarks like the Brooklyn Academy of Music and dynamic new destinations like Barclays Center.", 'Conveniently near 10 subway lines including 2/3/B/D/4/5/C/N/Q/R', '~NO BROKERS FEE!', 'FOR ALL INQUIRIES AND TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING CALL OR TEXT CHARLES TODAY 347.677.3911 check out my newest deals and virtual tours on: ig: @realestatebycharles', 'Charles Elbaz', 'Phone: 347-677-3911', 'Mobile: 347-677-3911', 'Fax: (212) 227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 347-677-3911 \xa0 347-677-3911 \xa0 FAX (212) 227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Charles Elbaz at 347-677-3911']
